text: is a Japanese politician. She is a member of the House of Representatives. She is a self-described conservative. She is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP). In October 2021, she became the Minister of Loneliness in the Fumio Kishida cabinet. She was the Minister of Internal Affairs and Communications from 3 August 2017 to 2 October 2018.Seiko NODA (The Cabinet) at Government of Japan website In August 2024, Noda said she would be interested in running for the Liberal Democratic Party presidency in the 2024 election to replace Fumio Kishida. She previously ran in 2021, losing to Kishida. However the following month, she decided not to run after not getting enough support. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Internal Affairs and Communications ministers of Japan
title: Seiko Noda
